title: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig - Commentary on Chapter 20
description: The moment has passed, the dazzle is gone... Pheadrus is left with a ghost, and something wrong, something wrong...what is it? Doesn't everyone want to be a big deal in Hollywood?
